article_title: Hamas rebuffs Blinken blame for elusive ceasefire
sentence: The  war  began  after  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Hamas rebuffs Blinken blame for elusive ceasefire
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  more  than  37,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  offensive  since  then.
